user_task_description: Please select the sentences in the 'background.tex' file in Overleaf, starting from "Depending on" to the end of the paragraph. Then, request ChatGPT to polish them and paste the revised sentences back into the 'background.tex' file in Overleaf.
high_level_task_description: Select sentences in the 'background.tex' file in Overleaf, copy them, and request ChatGPT to polish the text. Copy the polished text from ChatGPT and paste it back into the 'background.tex' file in Overleaf.

The layout includes a sidebar on the left with a list of files such as 'background.tex', 'conclusion.tex', and others. The main workspace displays text within a text editor, currently showing content related to Ethereum, accounts, and transactions. The editor has toolbar options like 'Recompile', 'Review', 'Share', and a search bar. There are various text formatting controls available as well. Since no errors are noted, the current state is appropriate for making a selection.
